code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const authService={login:async(email,password)=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/auth/login"),{email,password});return response.data;},register:async userData=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/auth/register"),userData);return response.data;},verifyToken:async token=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/api/auth/verify"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data.user;}};
